idea-plugin.name: GitLab Mentions
idea-plugin.description: GitLab Mentions provides @username auto-completion for GitLab group members in Markdown. Suggestions are fetched from a configured GitLab group via the REST API and cached for a configurable time-to-live (TTL). Configure the GitLab host URL, personal access token, group ID, cache TTL, and maximum number of suggestions under Settings → Tools → GitLab Mentions.
